GSP30abhiprvu:89_0: iti / icchan iti icchāviṣayīkṛtasya phalasya pravṛtto hetutvaṃ śatrā darśayati /

GSP30abhiprvu:100: tathā hi ---- sphuṭatarabhāsasamānanīlasukhādipramānveṣaṇadvāreṇaiva pāramārthikapramātṛlābha iha upadiśyate / yadāha anyatraḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:109: iti / iyatā ca upāye atidurghaṭatvāśaṅkā parākṛtā / yadante nirūpayiṣyati
GSP30abhiprvu:112: iti / tamya maheśvarasya pratyabhijñā pratīpamātmābhimukhyena jñānaṃ prakāśaḥ pratyabhijñā / pratīpam iti ---- svātmāvabhāso hi na ananubhūtapūrvo'vicchinnaprakāśatvāt tasya ,
GSP30abhiprvu:113: sa tu tacchaktyaiva vicchinna iva vikalpita iva lakṣyate ---- iti vakṣyate / pratyabhijñā ca ---- bhātabhāsamānarūpānusaṃdhānātmikā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:114: sa evāyaṃ caitra ---- iti pratisaṃdhānena abhimukhībhūte vastuni jñānam ;
GSP30abhiprvu:115: loke'pi etatputra evaṃguṇa evaṃrūpaka ityevaṃ vā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:116: antato'pi sāmānyātmanā vā jñātasya punarabhimukhībhāvāvasare pratisaṃdhiprāṇitameva jñānaṃ pratyabhijñā ---- iti vyavahriyate ;
GSP30abhiprvu:117_1: īśvare sati svātmanyabhimukhībhūte tatpratisaṃdhānena jñānam udeti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:118: nūnaṃ sa eva īśvaro'ham ---- iti / tāmenām upapādayāmi iti / upapattiḥ saṃbhavaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:119: tāṃ saṃbhavantīṃ tatsamarthācaraṇena prayojakavyāpāreṇa saṃpādayāmi / tathā hi ---- saṃbhavati tāvad asau ,
GSP30abhiprvu:121_1: svaparavibhāgābhāve tadapekṣaṃ kartrabhiprāyādi asaṃbhāvyam iti parasmaipadaprayogaḥ /

GSP30abhiprvu:129: iti / ṭīkākāreṇāpi vṛttimātraṃ vyākhyātumudyatena nedaṃ spṛṣṭam ,

GSP30abhiprvu:135: guruparvakramaḥ saṃbandha -- iti darśitam / tathā hi ---- samastasaṃpallakṣaṇo vyākhyāto yo'rthaḥ pūrvaṃ puṇyapāpādau saṃsāramūlakāraṇe hetuḥ ,

GSP30abhiprvu:139: iti śākhānte nirūpayiṣyamāṇaṃ sūcayatā upāyaḥ darśitaḥ abhidheyatvena / ata eva
GSP30abhiprvu:141: ityupakramapūrvakaṃ ślokāntaraṃ bhaviṣyati / prayojanaṃ ca pratyabhijñopāyajñānam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:148: pahlepsavo ye punaratra teṣāṃ mūḍhā sthitiḥ syādanavasthayaiva //}
GSP30abhiprvu:152: iti pādadvayena / janasya ityanena adhikārī darśitaḥ / yat nigamayiṣyati
GSP30abhiprvu:158: iti / evaṃ pratyabhijñātavyasamastavastusaṃgrahaṇena idaṃ vākyamuddeśarūpaṃ pratijñāpiṇḍātmakaṃ ca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:161: iti ca antyaśloko nigamanagranthaḥ -- ityevaṃ pañcāvayavātmakamidaṃ śāstraṃ paravyutpattiphalam / naiyāyikakramasyaiva māyāpade pāramārthikatvam ---- iti granthakārābhiprāyaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:163: ityādiṣu uddeśeṣu prakaṭībhaviṣyati -- iti tāvad granthasya tātparyam sujanaśca laukikeśvaraparicita īśvaraviṣaye janam anujīviguṇasaṃpannaṃ prakāśayati ,

GSP30abhiprvu:188: ajaḍātmā niṣedhaṃ vā siddhiṃ vā vidadhīta kaḥ // Ipk_1,1.2 //
GSP30abhiprvu:189: iha ka īśvare kīdṛśe kīdṛśena pramāṇena asti iti jñānalakṣaṇāṃ siddhim ,

GSP30abhiprvu:194: dehādirjaḍaḥ iti cet , sa eva svātmani asiddhaḥ paratra kāṃ siddhiṃ kuryāt ?
GSP30abhiprvu:195: ātmāpi asvaprakāśo jaḍa eva tattulyayogakṣemaḥ / svaprakāśasvabhāvaḥ iti cet ,

GSP30abhiprvu:201: bheditānāṃ ca antaranusaṃdhānena abhedanaṃ na syāt ;

GSP30abhiprvu:206: na khalu sarvaśabdārtho jñātṛkartṛtvayoḥ svarūpaṃ bhinatti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:207: bhedadarśane'pi īśvarajñānacikīrṣāyajñādernityasya viṣayeṇa akāraṇabhūtena anādheyātiśayatvāt / prakāśamānatānayanameva viṣayatvam iti cet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:208_1: viṣayo'pi sarvātmanā prakāśa eva nimagna iti prakāśaḥ prakāśate ---- ityetāvanmātraparamārthatve

GSP30abhiprvu:213: anyathā smṛtyayogāt ; prakāśasya ca nityatvāt vicchedahetorabhāvena ,
GSP30abhiprvu:215: svaparapramātṛvibhāgasya tatsṛṣṭasya māyīyatvena vakṣyamāṇatvāt / sa cāyaṃ svatantraḥ / svātantryaṃ ca asya abhede bhedanam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:216_0: bhedite ca antaranusaṃdhānena abhedanam ---- iti bahuprakāraṃ vakṣyāmaḥ / etadeva
GSP30abhiprvu:216_1: asya pārameśvaryaṃ mukhyamānandamayaṃ rūpam ---- iti pūrvamupāttaṃ kartari iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:216_2: tadeva tu svātantryaṃ vibhajya vaktuṃ jñātari iti pañcānnirdiṣṭam / jñānapallavasvabhāvaiva
GSP30abhiprvu:216_3: hi kriyā ---- iti vakṣyate / tena sarvakriyāsvatantre sarvaśaktike ---- iti yāvad
GSP30abhiprvu:216_4: uktaṃ bhavet tāvadeva kartari jñātari iti / iyameva ca saṃvitsvabhāvatā / saṃviditi
GSP30abhiprvu:216_5: tu ucyamānā vikalpyatvena prameyatāṃ spṛśanto sṛṣṭatvāt na paramārthasaṃvit ----
GSP30abhiprvu:216_6: iti vakṣyāmaḥ / kartā jñātā ca maheśvara ---- ityabhidhāne'pi sa eva prakāra āpatet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:217: iti yathā yathā prameyabhūmikāpādananyakkārakalaṅkaparihāraḥ śakyaḥ tathā tathā yāvadgati yatitavyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:218: iti bhūtavibhaktyā nirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ / upadeśāvasare hi sarvātmanā tāvat sā prameyatā asya parihartum aśakyā / svātmani iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:222: etadeva māheśvarya yad anavacchinnaparkāśatvena jñātṛkartṛtvadhāropārohaḥ / ajaḍātmā iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:223: yasya tu vaiśeṣikāderjaḍa ātmā sa siddhiṃ karotu īśvaraviṣayām ;
GSP30abhiprvu:225: sāṃkhyo'pi viṣayāvabhāsanarūpaṃ jñānaṃ buddhidharmamicchan ātmānaṃ vastuto jaḍameva upaiti ;
GSP30abhiprvu:226: na ca jaḍātmā svātmanyapi durlabhaprakāśasvātantryaleśaḥ kiṃcit sādhayituṃ niṣeddhuṃ vā prabhaviṣṇuḥ pāṣāṇa iva ;
GSP30abhiprvu:228: tathā hi ---- sa svātmani siddhimitthaṃ kuryāt ---- yadi asya so'bhinavatvena bhāsamānaḥ pūrvaṃ na bhāsate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:229: na bhāsanaṃ cet jaḍataiva / niṣedhaṃ ca itthaṃ vidadhyāt ---- yadi sa na prakāśate tathā ca jaḍaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:230: na ca jaḍasya etat yuktam ityuktam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:231: nāpi ajaḍasya ; tasmāt saṃvitprakāśa eva ghaṭādiprakāśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:234: tat na tatra kārakavyāpāravat pramāṇavyāpāro'pi nityatvavat svaprakāśatvasyāpi tatra bhāvāt //2//
GSP30abhiprvu:235: nanu kārakavyāpāraḥ pramāṇavyāpāraśca yadi īśvare na saṃbhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:236: tarhi pratyabhijñāpayāmi ---- iti yo vyāpāra uktaḥ sa katamo vyāpāraḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:243: tatra ca asya svātantryam iti na kenacidvapuṣā na prakāśate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:245: tatrāpi prakāśātmani sarvathā prakāśātmanā prakāśo bhāgaśo vā ;
GSP30abhiprvu:246: bhāgaśaḥ prakāśane sarvasya vyatirekeṇa avyatirekeṇa vā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:248: uktaprakārapūrṇatayā vā ; tadamī sapta prakārāḥ / tatra prathamaḥ prakāro jaḍollāsaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:251: saiva bhagavato māyā vimohinī nāma śaktiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:252: tadvaśāt prakāśātmatayā satatam avabhāsamāne'pi ātmani bhāgena aprakāśanavaśād anupalakṣite sarvathā hṛdayaṃgamībhāvamaprāpte ata eva pūrṇatāvabhāsanasādhyām arthakriyām akurvati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:255: śakteḥ īśvaraniṣṭhatvena prasiddhāyā dṛkkriyātmikāyāḥ , āviṣkaraṇena pradarśanena ,
GSP30abhiprvu:256: abhimānasādhyārthakriyāṇāṃ tadabhimānasiddhyā vinā asiddheḥ ; tathā ca dṛṣṭāntaṃ darśayati
GSP30abhiprvu:259: iti / etaduktaṃ bhavati ---- na kārakavyāpāro bhagavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:262: vyavahārasādhanānāṃ pramāṇānāṃ tāvatyeva viśrānteḥ / ghaṭo'yamagragaḥ pratyakṣatvāt ---- ityanena hi ghaṭo na jñāpyate pratyakṣeṇaiva prakāśamānatvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:264: kevalaṃ mohamātramapasāryate / yaścāyaṃ mohastadapasāraṇaṃ ca yat ,
GSP30abhiprvu:266: na tu adhikaṃ kiṃcit ---- ityuktaṃ vakṣyate ca //3//
GSP30abhiprvu:267: nanu paridṛśyamāne bhāvarāśau kimīyā śaktirāviṣkriyate kaṃ ca prati iti / jaḍānāṃ tāvat na jñānātmikā śaktirasti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:269: tathā ca ratho gacchati ---- ityādau upacāraṃ kecana pratipannāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:270: na ca jaḍānprati vyavahārasādhanam ucitam ; atha ajaḍajīvajjanatādhikāreṇa ubhayamapi ,
GSP30abhiprvu:271: tarhi sarvasya svātmā maheśvara ---- iti dūrataraṃ viprakarṣitā pratyāśā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:275: jñānaṃ kriyā ca bhūtānāṃ jīvatāṃ jīvanaṃ matam // Ipk_1,1.4 //
GSP30abhiprvu:277: dṛśyatāṃ kila ityarthaḥ / tathā ityanena sādhyaṃ sūcyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:279: prakṛtaṃ sādhyaṃ hetusiddhyāyattamupakramyate ityarthaḥ / tena iti buddhivartinā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:280: tata eva smaryamāṇena granthena varṇayiṣyamāṇena prakāreṇa yasmāt sarvametad yuktam iti tathā hi iti śabdasya vārthaḥ / iha tāvat bhāvarāśiryathā vimṛśyate tathā asti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:281: astitvasya prakāśaṃ śaraṇīkurvataḥ prakāśaprāṇitadeśīyaṃ āśritya samunmevāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:282: avimṛṣṭaṃ hi yadi vastu tanna nīlaṃ na pītaṃ na sat na asaditi kuta iti paryanuyoge kimuttaraṃ syāt / tena yad yathā yāvat avādhitaṃ vimṛśyate tat tathā tāvat asti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:283: tat eva deśakālākāravitatātmāno 'pi dravyakriyāsaṃbandhādayaḥ ekatvena paramārthasanta iti vakṣyate
GSP30abhiprvu:286: tataśca vitatamapi idaṃ viśvaṃ saṃkṣepavimarśadaśādhirohe jaḍaṃ jīvacca ---- ityetāvatā dvayarūpeṇa asti / tatra jaḍā vimṛśyamānā na svatantrā bhavanti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:287: vimṛśyamānatā hi teṣāṃ na svaśarīraviśrāntaḥ ko 'pi dharmaḥ jaḍatvābhāvaprasaṃgāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:288: mama nīlaṃ bhāti mayā nīlaṃ jñāyate iti / teṣām jaḍabhūtānāṃ cinmayatve 'pi māyākhyayā īśvaraśaktyā jāḍyaṃ prāpitānām ,
GSP30abhiprvu:290: tato jaḍā nāma na pṛthak santi / yathoktaṃ granthakṛtaivaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:294: iti / sa eva hi svātmanā san vaktavyo yasya anyānupahitaṃ rūpaṃ cakāsti ;
GSP30abhiprvu:295: na ca bhārūpānupahitaṃ jaḍaṃ nāma kiñcit ,
GSP30abhiprvu:296_0: tena jaḍānāṃ hi śaktirāviṣkriyate jaḍānprati ---- ityetat tāvat nirutthānameva /
GSP30abhiprvu:296_1: ye tu anye jaḍebhyo jīvanta ---- iti nāma prasiddhāḥ teṣāmapi śarīraprāṇapuryaṣṭakaśūnyākārāḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:296_2: tāvat jaḍā eva iti teṣāmapi kimucyate / ata eva ghaṭaśarīraprāṇasukhatadbh |
GSP30abhiprvu:297: avarūpaṃ yallagnaṃ bhāti tadeva jīvarūpabhūtaṃ satyam ;
GSP30abhiprvu:298: tasya ca āpāte yadyapi bahutvaṃ bhāti tathāpi tat jaḍātmakavedyaśarīrādyupādheḥ / tatastat apārabhārthikam anyonyāśrayāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:299: jīvā hi jaḍabhedāt bhedabhāginaḥ jaḍāśca jīvabhedāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:301_0: nīlapītādibhāvabhedāstu pramātṛsaṃlagnatayā bhedabhūmimeva paramadhirūḍhā iti / kim
GSP30abhiprvu:301_1: tena / tadayaṃ jīvānāmabheda eva saṃpanna iti jīvan pramātā ---- iti jātam / jīvanaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:302: yo hi jānāti ca karoti ca sa jīvati ---- ityucyate / tadayaṃ pramātā jñānakriyāśaktiyogād īśvara ---- iti vyavahartavayaḥ purāṇāgamādiprasiddheśvaravat ;
GSP30abhiprvu:304: tadapi ca kalpiteśvare rājādau tathā vyāptigrahaṇāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:305: yo yāvati jñātā kartā ca sa tāvati īśvarp rājeva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:307: ātmā ca viśvatra jñātā kartā ca ---- iti siddhā pratyabhijñā / jñānakriyāśakto eva svābhāvikyau aprarūḍhabhedonmeṣe sadāśiveśvarau ,
GSP30abhiprvu:309: viśoṣataḥ prarohe buddhikarmendriyagaṇa iva bhaviṣyati / jaḍā iti ajīvantaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:310: anye ca jīvanta ---- ityāpāte tāvad bhāti na tu saṃvidāpāte bhātīti jīvatāmiti jaṅgamā eva amī itthaṃ nirdiṣṭāḥ //4//
GSP30abhiprvu:311: nanu jñānakriye eva kathaṃ siddhe yata aiśvaryavyavahāraḥ prasādhyate ---- iti śaṅkāṃ śamayitumāha
GSP30abhiprvu:313: tatra jñānaṃ svataḥ siddhaṃ kriyā kāyāśritā satī /
GSP30abhiprvu:316: mayā jñātaṃ jñāsyate ca ---- ityevaṃ svaprakāśāhaṃparāmarśapariniṣṭhitameva idaṃ jñānaṃ nāma ,
GSP30abhiprvu:324: kim uttaraṃ ca syāt ---- iti / tatra ca jānāmi ---- ityantaḥsaṃrambhayogo 'pi bhāti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:325: yena śuklāderguṇāt atyantajaḍāt jānāmi ---- iti ---- vapuḥ citsvabhāvatām abhyetiḥ ;
GSP30abhiprvu:326: sa ca saṃrambho vimarśaḥ kriyāśaktirbhavati / yaduktam asmatparameṣṭhiśrosromānandapādaiḥ ----
GSP30abhiprvu:328: iti / tena āntarī kriyāśaktiḥ jñānavadeva svataḥ siddhā svaprakāśā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:329_0: saiva tu svaśaktyā / prāṇapuryaṣṭakakrameṇa śarīramapi saṃcaramāṇā spandanarūpā satī
GSP30abhiprvu:329_1: vyāpārātmikā māthāpade 'pi pramāṇasya pratyakṣāderviṣayaḥ / sā ca paraśarīrādisāhityena
GSP30abhiprvu:332: na ca anyadvastu anyena vapuṣā bhātaṃ bhātaṃ bhavet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:334: bhāti ca yat tadeva ahamityasya vapuḥ iti parajñānamapi svātmaivaḥ ;
GSP30abhiprvu:336: sa cāpi vicārito yāvat na anya iti viśvaḥ pramātṛvargaḥ paramārthata ekaḥ pramātā sa eva ca asti / taduktam
GSP30abhiprvu:339_0: iti / tataśca bhagavān sadāśivo jānāti ityataḥ prabhṛti krimirapi jānāti ---- ityantam
GSP30abhiprvu:339_1: eka eva pramātā iti phalataḥ sarvajñatvaṃ pramātuḥ / evaṃ kartṛtve 'pi vācyam / yaduktam
GSP30abhiprvu:342: sadāśivātmanā vedmi sa vā vetti madātmanā //
GSP30abhiprvu:344: ityādi / ūhyate ityanena jñānena jñānasya prameyatvaṃ na nirvahati ---- iti darśayati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:346: tadevaṃ yeṣāṃ tārkikapravādapāṃsupātadhūsarībhāvo na vṛtto 'smin saṃvedanapathe ,
GSP30abhiprvu:347_0: te iyataiva ātmānamīśvaraṃ vidvāṃso ghaṭaśarīraprāṇasukhatadabhāvān tatraiva nimajjayanta
GSP30abhiprvu:347_1: īśvarasamāviṣṭā eva bhavanti / tato 'yam upoddhātaḥ / upa iti ātmanaḥ samīpe ṭaṅkavat
GSP30abhiprvu:348_0: etāvadeva ca asya granthasya tātparyam ---- iti / tato 'pi ayam upoddhātaḥ / upāṃśu
GSP30abhiprvu:348_1: avitataṃ kṛtvā uditi śāstrasya ūrdhva eva hanyate apasāryate prameyaviṣayo vyāmoho
GSP30abhiprvu:349: jñāyate prameyaṃ yena iti / kecittu gatiṃ striyaṃ gacchati ---- ityetadviṣayameva hantyarthamāhuḥ / evaṃ ślokacatuṣṭayārthabhāvanādārḍhy|
GSP30abhiprvu:351: iti śrīmadācāryotpaladevaśiṣya ---- śrīmadācāryalakṣmaṇaguptadattopadeśa ---- śrīmadācāryābhinavaguptaviracitāyāṃ śrīpratyabhijñāvimarśinyāṃ jñānādhikāre upoddhātaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:357: iha yat paramārtharūpaṃ āśaṅkyamānapratipakṣapratikṣepeṇa nirūpayiṣyamāṇaṃ suṣṭhutamāṃ spaṣṭokṛtaṃ bhavati / yadāha bhaṭṭanārāyaṇaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:360: jñānānandaṃ ca nirdvandvaṃ deva vṛtvā vivṛṇvate //}
GSP30abhiprvu:361: tatreha anātmānīśvaravādināṃ bhrāntibhedanapūrvakaṃ paramārthaṃ vivarīṣyan tadudbhāvanaṃ tāvat ekādaśabhiḥ ślokaiḥ karoti
GSP30abhiprvu:365_0: ityantaiḥ / tatra ślokadvayena ātmano dhruvasya dṛśyānupalabdhyā abhāva uktaḥ pratyakṣātmavādinaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:365_1: prati / tatra ślokatrayeṇa smṛtyanusaṃdhānaṃ saṃskārāt siddham iti anyabāsiddhatvāt
GSP30abhiprvu:365_2: ātmānumānāya na paryāptam ---- iti proktam anumeyātmavādinaḥ prati / tatra ślokena
GSP30abhiprvu:365_3: jñānādi guṇairguṇini pratipattiḥ ---- iti anumānaṃ nirastam / evam ātmānaṃ nirākṛtya ,
GSP30abhiprvu:366: tato jñānakriyāśaktisaṃbandharūpamaiśvarya nirākartuṃ jñānasya svarūpameva vyatiriktaṃ vādyantaramate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:367_0: sāṃkhyamate ca ayujyamānam ---- iti nirūpitaṃ ślokadvayena / tata ekena kriyā nāma
GSP30abhiprvu:367_1: na kācit kvacidapi asti ---- iti kathitam / tatra sādhakaṃ pratikṣipya bādhakaṃ ca
GSP30abhiprvu:367_2: upanyasyati / tataḥ saṃbandhasya ślokena nāstitvaṃ pratipāditaṃ pramāṇābhāvaṃ vadatā /
GSP30abhiprvu:368: na ātmā sthiro nāpi jñātṛtvakartṛtvalakṣaṇam asya aiśvaryam ---- iti svapakṣa upasaṃhṛtaḥ ---- iti pūrvapakṣasya piṇḍārthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:371: sābhilāpaṃ vikalpākhyaṃ bahudhā nāpi tad dvayam // Ipk_1,2.1 //
GSP30abhiprvu:374: nanu iti ākṣepe ; iha ātmā saṃvitsvabhāvaḥ sthiraḥ iti tāvadayuktam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:375_0: sthirasyāpi svaprakāśasya aprakāśanāt / tathā hi ---- ghaṭaprakāśo ghaṭavikalpo ghaṭapratyabhijñā
GSP30abhiprvu:375_1: ghaṭasmṛtiḥ ghaṭotprekṣā ---- ityādirūpeṇa jñānānyeva prakāśante bhinnakāntāni bhinnaviṣayāṇi
GSP30abhiprvu:375_2: bhinnakārāṇi ca / tatra nīlasya prakāśaḥ svalakṣaṇābhāsaṃ jñānam svam anyānanuyāyi
GSP30abhiprvu:376: lakṣaṇam deśakālākārarūpaṃ yasya ābhāsaḥ prakāśanam antarmukhaṃ yasmin bahirmukhīnasvarūpadhāriṇi jñāne tat avikalpakam viṣayabhede 'pi ekajātīyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:377: svarūpavaicitrye 'pi kāraṇābhāvāt / vikalpe hi vaicitryakāraṇam abhilāpaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:378: sa ca ata nāsti ; na hi abhilāpo nīlasya dharmaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:384: sarvasya vikalpasya sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā nirvikalpakamūlatvāt / param iti ca anyarūpaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tasya viṣayaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:388: tena hi ananuyāyinā na punarvyavahāraḥ / tacca bahubhedam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:389: yatastat abhilāpena saṃjalpātmanā śabdarūpeṇa saha vartate / śabdanaṃ ca idam ---- iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:393: idaṃ vā idam ---- ityādi bahudhā bhidyate / tacca na viṣayapakṣo vartate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:394: api tu tasya vikalpasya svarūpameva vicitrokurvat pratibhāti iti vikalpo bahubhedaḥ / evam anubhavavikalpaparamparā tāvat svaprakāśatvena bhāti /
GSP30abhiprvu:396: yallagnāsau paramparā so'pi ābhāti ---- iti ; tatra ,
GSP30abhiprvu:397: yato dvayamapi etad avikalpetararūpaṃ na anyasya kasyacit etadatiriktasya draṣṭuḥ anubhavituḥ saṃbandhi ,
GSP30abhiprvu:398: dṛśyasya tu bhavatu bāhyārthavāde / atra hetuḥ ---- yataḥ tasya draṣṭuḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:400: atra etadbodhadvayamadhye nāsti avabhāsaḥ / nanu astyeva avabhāsaḥ ---- iti asiddhā dṛśyānupalabdhiḥ / tathā hi ---- ahaṃ vedmi ,
GSP30abhiprvu:402_0: smarāmi idam ---- iti vidādiprakṛtyartharūpāt jñānasmṛtyādeḥ idam ---- iti ca karmarūpāt
GSP30abhiprvu:402_1: viṣayāt atiriktameva aham ---- iti anuyāyini prakāśe anuyāyirūpaṃ bhāti / ka evamāha bhāti ---- iti ?
GSP30abhiprvu:404: aham ---- iti śabdānuviddho vikalpapratyayaḥ / nanu tathāpi kim anena vikalpyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:407: matvarthīyaśca santānameva spṛśati nātiriktam / tadetaduktam ---- ahaṃpratītirapi śarīram ,
GSP30abhiprvu:412: sābhilāpaṃ vikalpākhyam ityanena saṃgṛhītatvāt / etaduktaṃ bhavati ---- ahaṃpratītireva tāvat na ātmā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:413: tasyā api vikalparūpatvāt asthairyācca / etatpratītipratyayo 'pi nāsti anyaḥ śarīrādeḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:414_0: bhavannapi vā vedyapakṣapatitaḥ syāt ---- iti / tathāpi saṃvitsaṃvedyavyatiriktasya
GSP30abhiprvu:414_1: ātmano na siddhiḥ ---- ityetat apiśabdena dyotitam / evaṃ nāsti ātmā saṃvitsaṃvedyatryatirikto
GSP30abhiprvu:418: kathaṃ bhavenna nityaḥ syādātmā yadyanubhāvakaḥ // Ipk_1,2.3 //
GSP30abhiprvu:419: iha smṛtikāle susmūrṣito 'rtho bhavatu , dhvaṃsatāṃ vā ---- iti kintena(KSS: kimanena)
GSP30abhiprvu:422: tameva ca anurundhānā smṛtirjāyate / tathā hi ---- smṛtau na arthasya prakāśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:426: sarvatra ayam ---- iti pratyayaprasaṅgāt ; kiṃtu anubhavaprakāśa eva smṛtau pradhānam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:427: anubhavasya tu arthaprakāśātmakatvāt anubhavaprakāśanāntarīyako 'rthāvabhāsaḥ iti / sarvathā yadi anubhavo dhvastaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:428: tadā tatprakāśarūpā kathaṃ smṛtistaddvāreṇa arthaviṣayā syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:429: tayā ca sarvo vyavahāraḥ kriyamāṇo dṛṣṭaḥ ityasau svarūpeṇa anapahnavanīyā satī anubhavasya nāśe kiṃcit avinaṣṭam āvedayati / tadeva ca anubhavakartṛ ---- anubhavitṛrūpam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:430: ātmā anubhāvako nityaḥ ---- iti / iyadeva ca ātmasiddherjīvitam / tattu na adhikam ihaiva unmīlitam ācāryeṇa ,
GSP30abhiprvu:431: vaktavyaśeṣavivakṣayā pūrvapakṣo mā tāvat samāpat ityāśayena / kathaṃ bhavet iti / arhtastāvat tasyām akiṃcitkaraḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:432: anubhavaśca dhvastaḥ iti na kenacitprakāreṇa smṛtiḥ syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:433: tadabhāve ca saṃketaśabdasmṛtyāyattā api astaṅgatāḥ sarve vikalpāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:434: nirvikalpaṃ ca andhabadhiramūkaprāyam iti hanta nirākrandam avasīdet viśvam ---- iti //3//
GSP30abhiprvu:435: iha kāryātirekeṇa tādṛk kalpanīyaṃ yat kāryasiddhaye paryāpnoti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:439: anubhavaśca dhvastaḥ ---- ityuktam ; yadi ātmā kaścidasti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:440: kiṃ tena / etadapi hi vaktavyam ---- ākāśamapi asti ---- iti / atha ucyate ---- na kevalena ātmanā etat siddhyati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:441: api tu anubhavasaṃskāro 'pi atra upayogī ---- iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:447: dṛṣṭeṣu anubhūteṣu vastuṣu yā smṛtiḥ tasyām anubhavo dṛgātmā dvāram arthāśasparśe ,
GSP30abhiprvu:449: tasya hi anāśe idam ---- ityeṣa eva atruṭitaḥ prakāśaḥ iti kā smṛtiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:451: yatraiva viṣaye anubhavo vṛttaḥ tadeva tasyāḥ smṛteḥ padaṃ smaryamāṇam / tatpadā ---- iti bahuvrīhiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:453: nanu jñānāntarasya viṣayeṇa kathaṃ tasyāḥ viṣayitvābhimānaḥ ---- ityāśaṅkyāha
GSP30abhiprvu:459: ākṛṣṭaśākhādeścirasaṃvartitasya vivartyamānasya bhūrjādeḥ / tena atrāpi saṃskāraḥ tāṃ smṛtiṃ pūrvānubhavānukāriṇīṃ karoti ---- iti tadviṣaya eva smṛterviṣayaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:460: evaṃ tarhi antargaḍuḥ yathā āyāsāya param ,
GSP30abhiprvu:461: tadvat ātmā sthiraḥ kalpanāyāsamātraphalaḥ iti kiṃ tena ,
GSP30abhiprvu:462: sarvaṃ hi saṃskāreṇa jagadvyavahārakuṭumbakaṃ kṛtakarāvalambam ---- iti //5//
GSP30abhiprvu:465: ya āśrayaḥ sa ātmā syāt ---- ityāśaṅkyāha
GSP30abhiprvu:471: sa tarhi avyatiriktaḥ iti na nityaḥ syāt ; atha na kaścit asya viśeṣaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:472: tena tarhi kim / atha saṃskāra eva asya viśeṣaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:473_0: tarhi na vyatirikto 'sau iti punarapi anitye jñāne saṃskāraḥ ---- ityāyātam / anubhavādviśiṣṭaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:473_1: viśiṣṭasmrṭyākhyakāryakāri jñānaṃ paramparayā jāyate ---- iti iyāneva saṃskārārthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:474_0: tasya tarhi kimasau / saṃbandhaśca vyatirikto nirākariṣyate / evaṃ jñānasukhaduḥkhecchādveṣaprayatnadharmādharmā
GSP30abhiprvu:474_1: api vikalpanīyāḥ / etadāha ---- tataḥ iti ātmano bhinneṣu dharmeṣu aṅgīkriyamāṇeṣu teṣu satsvapi ,
GSP30abhiprvu:475: ātmanaḥ svarūpe viśeṣābhāvāt sa tāvat ātmā smrṭau na vyāpriyeta ,
GSP30abhiprvu:478: iti saṃskārādeva smṛteḥ siddhiḥ ---- iti / ahaṃ smarāmi ---- iti yaḥ smartā so'pi śarīrasaṃtāno jñānasaṃtānaśca adhyāvasīyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:482: iti / evam ātmani sādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca parākṛtam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:489: ittham ātmānaṃ nirākṛtya , tasya aiśvaryamapi nirākartuṃ jñānaśaktimeva parīkṣitumāha
GSP30abhiprvu:491: jñānaṃ ca citsvarūpaṃ cet tad anityaṃ kimātmavat /
GSP30abhiprvu:493_0: parābhyupagamena prasaṅgāpādanam etat pūrvapakṣavādī karoti ---- prasaṅgaviparyayalābho
GSP30abhiprvu:493_1: me bhaviṣyati ---- iti / tatra ātmavādī nityatvam ātmana itthaṃ brūte ---- iha kālo
GSP30abhiprvu:493_2: nāma idaṃbhāvaviśiṣṭasya viśeṣaṇatām avalambamānaḥ taṃ viśiṣṭīkurvan tatsaṃkocāt

GSP30abhiprvu:529: kiṃ puruṣeṇa / evam arthapratibimbakadvāreṇa arthamayī ---- ityapi āyāto vijñānavādaḥ / kuta etasyāḥ tadrūpatvam ---- iti ,

GSP30abhiprvu:585_0: tasmāt jñānasaṃbandhāt jñātā iti yathā vikalpakalpito 'rtho na vastu tathā kriyāsaṃbandhāt
GSP30abhiprvu:585_1: kartā ityapi kalpanāmātram ---- iti pūrvapakṣasya saṃkṣepaḥ / iti śivam //11 // āditaḥ 16 //
GSP30abhiprvu:586: iti śrīmadācāryābhinavaguptaviracitāyāṃ pratyabhijñāsūtravimarśinyāṃ jñānādhikāre pūrvapakṣavivṛtirnāma dvitīyamāhnikam // 2 //
GSP30abhiprvu:591: etasmin pūrvapakṣe yaduktaṃ smṛteḥ saṃskāramātrādeva siddhiḥ ---- iti , tadeva dūṣayituṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:595_0: ityantaṃ ślokasaptakam / kriyāyāṃ saṃbandhe ca dūṣaṇoddharaṇaṃ dvitīye kriyādhikāre
GSP30abhiprvu:595_1: bhaviṣyati / yattu pareṇa vyatiriktaṃ jñānaṃ kāśādasāṃkhyādidṛṣṭau nirākṛtaṃ tadabhimatameva
GSP30abhiprvu:595_2: granthakṛta iti tat dūṣaṇāntarameva / tatra ślokadvayena jñānasya svasaṃvedanarūpatayā

GSP30abhiprvu:595_6: svapakṣe tadupapattiḥ ---- iti ślokenoktam ---- iti tātparyam / granthārthastu nirūpyate /

GSP30abhiprvu:615: paraprakāśanātmakanijarūpaprakāśanameva hi svaprakāśatvaṃ jñānasya bhaṇyate / nanu svābhāsameva sat tat anubhavajñānaṃ smaraṇe bhāsiṣyate ,

GSP30abhiprvu:652: na tu tayā arthaḥ svīkriyate tasya aprakāśanāt iti tayā artho na vyavasthāpita eva / prakāśanātmā hi vyavasthāpanā ,

GSP30abhiprvu:669_2: asau tūṣṇīkā iti balādeva tatrāṃśe jaḍatvam asyā āyātaṃ ghaṭajñānasyeva paṭe / na

GSP30abhiprvu:687_2: vyavahārāḥ / na ca dhvaṃsantām iti bhavadabhīṣṭaśāpamātrāt te dhvaṃsante ,

GSP30abhiprvu:692: saṃvit tāvat prakāśate iti tāvat na kecit apahnuvate / sā tu saṃvit yadi svātmamātraviśrāntā arthasya sā kathaṃ prakāśaḥ ?
GSP30abhiprvu:693: sa hi arthadharma eva tathā syāt ;
GSP30abhiprvu:694: tataśca arthaprakāśaḥ tāvatyeva paryavasita iti galito grāhyagrāhakabhāvaḥ / ato 'rthaprakāśarūpaṃ saṃvidam icchatā balādeva artho'pi tadrūpāntargata eva aṅgīkratavyaḥ ;
GSP30abhiprvu:695: sa ca arthaprakāśo yadi anyaśca anyaśca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:696_0: tat na smaraṇam upapannamityata eka eva asau ---- iti / ekatvāt sarvo vedyarāśiḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:696_1: tena kroḍīkṛtaḥ ---- ityetadapi anicchatā aṅgīkāryam / evamapi satatameva unmagnena
GSP30abhiprvu:698: ataḥ svarūpāntarbruḍitam artharāśim aparamapi bhinnākāram ātmani parigṛhya ,
GSP30abhiprvu:699_0: kaṃcideva arthaṃ svarūpāt unmagnam ābhāsayati ---- iti āpatitam / saiṣā jñānaśaktiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:699_1: unmagnābhāsabhinnaṃ ca citsvarūpaṃ vahirmukhatvāt tacchāyānurāgāt navaṃ navaṃ jñānamuktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:699_2: evamapi navanavābhāsāḥ pratikṣaṇam udayavyayabhāja iti saiva vyavahāranivahahāniḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:699_3: tena kvacit ābhāse gṛhītapūrve yat saṃvedanaṃ bahirmukham abhūt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:700_0: tasya yat antarmukhaṃ citsvarūpatvaṃ tat kālāntare 'pi avasthāsnu svātmagataṃ tadviṣayaviśeṣe
GSP30abhiprvu:700_1: bahirmukhatvaṃ parāmṛśati iti eśā smṛtiśaktiḥ / yacca tat navaṃ bhāsayati smarati
GSP30abhiprvu:700_2: vā tat vastutaḥ saṃvidā viśvamayyā tādātmyavṛtti iti viśvamayaṃ pūrṇameva iti navaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:700_3: na kiṃcit ābhāsitaṃ smṛtaṃ vā syāt / idamapi pravāhapatitam urīkāryam ---- yat kila
GSP30abhiprvu:703: saṃvedyaṃ ca saṃvedyāntaraāt ; na ca vicchedanaṃ vastutaḥ saṃbhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:704: iti vicchedanasya avabhāsamātram ucyate / na ca tat iyatā pāramārthikam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:705: nirmīyamāṇasya sarvasya ayameva paramārthaḥ / yataḥ eṣa eva paritaśchedanāt pariccheda ucyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:706_0: tadavabhāsanasāmarthyam apohanaśaktiḥ / anena śaktitrayeṇa viśve vyavahārāḥ / tacca
GSP30abhiprvu:706_2: sa eva hi tena tena vapuṣā jānāti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:710: jīve niruddhā tatrāpi paramātmani sā sthitā //}
GSP30abhiprvu:711_0: ityādi / etāsāṃ ca jñānādiśaktīnām asaṃkhyaprakāro vaicitryavikalpa iti tatsāmarthyaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:711_2: ucyate / tadevaṃ cidvapuḥ ityekaṃ kṛtvā iyadāyātam viśvarūpaḥ iti / tata eva ca pariniṣṭhitaikarūpajaḍabhāvavailakṣaṇyāt
GSP30abhiprvu:711_3: jñānādiśaktiyuktatāmāheśvaryam upasaṃprāptaḥ / etadanupagame na kiṃcit idaṃ bhāseta
GSP30abhiprvu:712: tasmāt etat avaśyāṅgīkartavyam ---- iti prasaṅgaviparyayaḥ / naśyejjanasthitiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:713: yadyevaṃ na syāt ---- iti prāktanena ślokena saha saṃbandhaḥ / cet ityanena tadviparyayaḥ sūcitaḥ //7//
GSP30abhiprvu:715: iti śrīmadācāryābhinavaguptaviracitāyāṃ īśvarapratyabhijñāsūtravimarśinyāṃ jñānādhikāre paradarśanānupapattirnāma tṛtīyamāhnikam // 3 //
GSP30abhiprvu:721: tadubhayānugrāhiṇī apohanaśaktiḥ ---- iti tāvat vastusaṃbhavakrameṇa pradarśitam / upakramānusāreṇa smṛtireva sūcitaprasaṅgaviparyayasamarthanadṛśā vivecyā /
GSP30abhiprvu:723: iti hi upakrāntam / tatra saṃskāramātrāt tāvat mā nāma udapādi smṛtiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:724: idaṃ tu vaktavyam ---- tathābhūtabhavadabhyupagatabhagavatprabhāvo'pi katham enāṃ kuryāt ---- iti śaṅkāṃ śamayituṃ smṛtitattvanirūpaṇāya
GSP30abhiprvu:728_0: ityantaṃ ślokāṣṭakam / tatra ślokena svapakṣe smṛtirupapannā ---- iti kathitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:728_2: anubhavena tadviṣayeṇa ca ekībhāvaparyanta āveśaḥ smaraṇasya uktaḥ / turyeṇa anubhavasya
GSP30abhiprvu:728_3: na viṣayatayā smṛtyā prakāśanam ---- iti nirūpitam / pañcamena yogijñānamapi anubhavaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:728_4: pṛthagbhāvena na viṣayīkaroti ---- iti baḍatā turyaślokārtha eva upodvalitaḥ / ṣaṣṭhenāśaṅkyamānam
GSP30abhiprvu:728_5: anubhavasya smṛtyā pṛthagviṣayīkaraṇaṃ kākpanikam ---- ityavāstavīkṛtam / saptamena
GSP30abhiprvu:728_6: smṛtiprasaṅgāt vikalpe'pi pūrvānubhavena aikyātmāveśo darśitaḥ / aṣṭamena smartavyasya
GSP30abhiprvu:729: prasaṅgācca dṛśyasya darśanasya draṣṭuśca ---- iti tātparyārthaḥ / atha krameṇa ślokārtha ucyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:732: pūrvamanubhūtasya arthasya ya upalandhā antarmukho bodhaḥ sa tāvat adyāpi parataḥ smṛtikāle'pi astyeva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:733_1: antaḥ artho'pi apṛthagbhāvena avasthitaḥ ---- ityetadapi ayatnasiddham / iyat tu
GSP30abhiprvu:733_2: cintyam ---- akālakalite saṃvedane tadantarvartini ca viśvatra bhāvajāte yadi tāvat
GSP30abhiprvu:734: tat aham iti etāvataiva pūrṇena vimarśena bhāvyam ;
GSP30abhiprvu:736: tathāpi tatra dvayī gatiḥ / aham ityaṃśe yadi viśrānyati idantā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:740: apūrvatābhāsanācca tat anubhavanameva syāt na smaraṇam ---- ityāśaṅgyāha svairī iti / svam ātmīyam upakaraṇam īrayati svakartavyeṣu avaśyaṃ tacchīlaśca ;
GSP30abhiprvu:741_0: svaṃ ca ātmānam īrayati na punaḥ svakartavye prerakamapekṣate ---- iti svairī svatantraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:741_1: tena svatantratvāt sa iti vimṛśati / sa iti vimarśanasya ca iyadrūpam ---- yat sarvathā
GSP30abhiprvu:742: nāpi atyantaṃ bhedena vimarśanameva api tu yo bhāvaḥ pūrvamanubhavakāle taddeśakālapramātrantarasācivyena pṛthakkṛto na ca ahantāyāmeva līnīkṛtaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:743: sa tādṛgeva tamaseva ācchādya avasthāpitaḥ saṃskāraśabdavācyaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:745: tatra apahastite sa pūrvavat pṛthakkṛte evāvabhāti / nanu ca idantayā avabhāset pūrvavadeva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:747_1: pūrvakālaparāmarśaḥ iti viruddhapūrvāparaparāmarśasvabhāva eva sa iti parāmarśa ucyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:747_2: evaṃ ca sa eva parameśvaraḥ smarati / etadeva hi tasya smartṛtvam ---- yat evaṃprakāraparāmarśocitakālakalādisparśasahiṣṇumāyāpramātṛbhāvaparigrahaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:747_4: āgamikāḥ smaraṇameva mantrādiprāṇitaṃ manyante / tathā ca
GSP30abhiprvu:750: iti / alaṃ tāvat / anena tṛnnantasamāsena yatnato 'nubhavasyārthamukhena kālasparśam arthaviśrāntatāṃ dvayorapi pramātari nirūḍhiṃ bhedābhedābhyāṃ darśayati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:751: vṛtto ekārthībhāvāt / tasya ca bhedābhedamayatvam ---- iti vakṣyāmaḥ //1//
GSP30abhiprvu:752: etadeva smṛtitattvamupapādayituṃ ślokāntarāṇi / tatra yadi kaścid brūyāt ---- iha smṛtirvikalpaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:755: anubhavena ca yena so'rthaḥ prakāśatāṃ nītaḥ sa idānīṃ kīrtimātramūrtirjātaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:756_0: na ca so'pi smṛtyā prakāśyate ---- jñānasya jñānāntareṇāsaṃvedyatvāt asattvācceti
GSP30abhiprvu:756_1: arthasya prakāśanābhāvāt idaṃ smarāmi iti jñānaṃ bhrāntimātrameva ---- iti punarapi āpatitam ---- iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:762: anyathā suptamūrcchitakalpatāpatteḥ / evaṃ ca yāvat adhyavasāyo'rthasya tāvat arthāt iti sāmarthyāt iyat abhyupagantavyam ---- yat so'rthaḥ prakāśate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:763: aprakāśamāne 'dhyavasātavye 'dhyavasāyo'ndhaprāyaḥ syāt / prakāśanaṃ ca na tadānīntanakālasya tyāgena ,
GSP30abhiprvu:765: idam ityevāvabhāsanaprasaṅgāt / tasmāt atītānubhavakālaḥ pūrvānubhūtabhāvasvālakṣaṇyākṣepakatvenāpekṣaṇīyo vedyabhāge prakāśātmakāvabhāsābhiniveśitayā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:766: smartṛdehaprāṇādyavabhāsakālaścāvalambanīyo vedakabhāge vimarśāṃśābhiniveśitvena / ābhāsamātraṃ hi bhāvasya svarūpam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:767_0: pratyābhāsaṃ pramāṇasya vyāpārāt / tadeva ābhāsāntaravyāmiśraṇayā dipasahasraprabhāsaṃmūrcchanavat
GSP30abhiprvu:768_0: kālaśaktereva bhedakatvāt iti vakṣyate / evaṃ tāvat svalakṣaṇībhāvaḥ prāktanadehābhāsasācivyābhyuditakālābhāsayā
GSP30abhiprvu:768_1: ghaṭābhāsasya iti / tāvatyeva vā smṛtiḥ ābhāsāntarairapi vyāmiśrā atisphuṭeti / atyantasphuṭībhāve
GSP30abhiprvu:768_2: 'pi tadānīntanakālatā na truṭyati anyasādhāraṇyānavabhāvāt / tathāvabhāse tu yoginastannirmāṇameva /
GSP30abhiprvu:768_3: brahmabhāṣitādau tu navameva avabhāsanam iti / atra tu āgamādimānāntarānubhūtabrahmādisvarūpasmaraṇaparamparā
GSP30abhiprvu:768_4: abhyupāyaḥ / bhāsayet iti vidhirūpeṇa niyogena niyamo lakṣyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:770_0: api tu bhāsayatyeva iti / svakāle iti smaraṇakāle / āmṛśan iti vedakabhāganiveśī
GSP30abhiprvu:770_1: vartamānakāla uktaḥ / pūrvābhāsitaṃ svalakṣaṇam iti vedyāṃśasparśī bhūtakālo ghaṭābhāsasyāpi
GSP30abhiprvu:770_2: kevalasya svālakṣaṇyāpattiheturdarśitaḥ / iyadeva smṛteḥ avyavhicāri vapuḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:771: arthitātiśayāt tu sphuṭatvam iti atha śabdo dyotayati / tadevāha asvilātmanā iti / sarvābhāsamiśreṇa vapuṣā ityarthaḥ //2//
GSP30abhiprvu:772: nanu evaṃ svalakṣaṇasya prakāśane bhedena bahistadavabhāseta / etadeva hi bahiravabhāsanam ---- yat svalakṣaṇaprakāśanam iti śaṅkāśamanāya nirūpayati
GSP30abhiprvu:774: na ca yuktaṃ smṛterbhede smaryamāṇasya bhāsanam /
GSP30abhiprvu:775: tenaikyaṃ bhinnakālānāṃ saṃvidāṃ veditaiṣa saḥ // Ipk_1,4.3 //
GSP30abhiprvu:776: smaraṇajñānāt bhinnatvena bahīrūpatayā yadi so 'rtho bhāseta smaryamāṇasya ca yat bhāsanaṃ tadeva na syāt smaryamāṇameva tat na syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:777: anubhūyamānameva tat bhavet iti yāvat / nanu caivaṃ kathaṃ svalakṣaṇasya prakāśanam uktam ?
GSP30abhiprvu:778: etat na idāṇīṃ prakāśanam api tu pūrvakāle eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:779: tadā cāsau bahiravabhāsata eva / nanu cedānīṃ tarhi kim ?
GSP30abhiprvu:780: vimarśanam iti brūmaḥ / nanu prakāśanavimarśanayoḥ bhinnakālatvam āpatitam / tataḥ kim ?
GSP30abhiprvu:785_0: asmaddarśane tu bhinnakālā api saṃvidaḥ tatkālātyāgenaiva ekatāvabhāsanena svatantraḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:785_1: pramātā yāvadantarmukhatayā tāvatyaṃśe vimṛśati tāvat prakāśasya tātkālikabahirbhāvābhāso
GSP30abhiprvu:785_2: vimarśasya idānīntanāntarmukhā sthitiriti / etadeva vedanādhikaṃ veditṛtvaṃ ----
GSP30abhiprvu:786_0: kartṛtvaṃ ca etadeva ucyate / ghaṭamahamanvabhūvam iti vā sa ghaṭaḥ iti vā aikyam
GSP30abhiprvu:786_1: anusaṃdhānam anusaṃdhāturabhinnam iti darśayituṃ yadeva aikyaṃ sa eva veditā iti
GSP30abhiprvu:786_2: sāmānādhikaraṇyena darśitam / eṣa sa iti ācchāditasyeva pramātṛtattvasya sphuṭāvabhāsanaṃ kṛtam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:788: vismayagarbhayānayā uktyā pratyabhijñā eva sūcitā / yadāha granthakāra eva
GSP30abhiprvu:793: nanu ca prācya eva anubhavo yadi smaryamāṇasya bahiravabhāsanarūpaḥ prakāśaḥ tarhi iyat ucyatām ---- so'nubhava idānīṃ smaraṇena viṣayīkriyate ---- iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:794: aikyena tu alaukikena ko'rthaḥ iti vyāmohaṃ vihantumāha
GSP30abhiprvu:798_0: pūrvo ghaṭādiḥ arthaḥ pṛthak iti idantayā bhāti sma naivaṃ smaraṇakāle smṛtijñānāt
GSP30abhiprvu:798_1: pṛthaktvena idaṃ pūrvamanubhavanam iti bhāti / yathā ca smṛtikāle tasmāt smṛtijñānāt
GSP30abhiprvu:798_2: so'rthaḥ prāk iti pūrvasvabhāvo na bhedena ābhāti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:799: smṛtikāle bahiravabhāsābhāvāt evaṃ tata eva hetoḥ pūrvo 'pi anubhavo na bhedena ābhāti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:801: anvabhūvam ityevam / etat kimucyate iti cet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:802_0: aham ---- ityevaṃsvabhāvo ya ātmā pūrvāparasaṃvidantarmukhasvabhāvaḥ tatra yat ārohaṇam
GSP30abhiprvu:802_1: viśramaḥ tena hetunā pūrvasaṃvidrūpatāyāḥ svaprakāśāyā bhāsanāt tallonasyāpi ghaṭasya
GSP30abhiprvu:802_2: svaprakāśadeśīyatvena bhāsanam / ātmani ca ārohaṇam viśramaṇā anubhavasya arthasya
GSP30abhiprvu:802_3: ca / prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārthaṃ saha brūtaḥ ---- iti nyāyāt saṃkhyākṣipte tadvati
GSP30abhiprvu:802_4: vā kartṛbhūte 'smadarthe 'nubhavo bruḍitaḥ taddvāreṇa artho'pi ca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:804: tadarthameva karma na nirdiṣṭam / ghaṭādiḥ punaḥ anubhavakāle na asmadarthamārohati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:805: hi yasmāt naiva bhāti pūrvo 'nubhavaḥ pṛthak aparārdhoktāt hetoḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:806: tasmāt saṃvidāmaikyam iti pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ / luṅā bhūtakālasya dyotitatvāt prāk iti bhinnakramaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:807: uttamapuruṣeṇa asmadarthasya aham ityapi / ārohaṇam iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:809: nanu ka evamāha ---- anubhavaḥ pṛthak na bhāti iti , ghaṭavat na bhāti iti cet kiṃ tataḥ ?
GSP30abhiprvu:810: ghaṭo'pi hi na anubhavasakhyaḥ bhāti iti kiṃ na bhāti ?
GSP30abhiprvu:811: svabhāvena bhāti iti tu ubhayatrāpi samānam / tathā hi ---- atītānāgatasūkṣmādi yathā yogijñāne viṣayībhavati iti abhyupagatam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:816: ālambanayogaśca kathaṃ śaṅkayeta na ca sālambanam iti / tasmāt parakīyamanubhavanamiva nijamapi viṣayīkriyatām ityāśaṅkya dṛṣṭānta evāsiddhaḥ iti bhānti ityantena ,
GSP30abhiprvu:817: abhyupagamena vā siddhatve 'pi prakṛte 'rthe viṣamaḥ iti śeṣeṇa darśayati
GSP30abhiprvu:821: yoginām yat etat darśanāntaram bhāvanādyudbhavaḥ paracittaviṣayo jñānaviśeṣaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:822: tatra dṛśaḥ iti upalabdhayo na bhānti / tathā hi ---- saugatānāṃ tāvat svaprakāśaikarūpaṃ jñānam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:824: tarhi yad asya nijaṃ vapuḥ ananyavedyatayā prakāśanaṃ nāma ,
GSP30abhiprvu:825: na tatprakāśitaṃ syāt / sāṃkhyānāmapi puruṣacchāyaiva upalabdhiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:826: puruṣaśca asaṃvedya parvā iti kathaṃ vedyā syāt / vaiśeṣikāṇāmapi ātmani abhedena samavāyi saṃvedanaṃ paragataṃ manasā kathaṃ gṛhyeta antaḥśarīravṛttinā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:827: taccharīrāntaranupraveśe tu tasyaiva aham iti śarīrīkaraṇāt ahantāvabhāsitatvāt ātmano bhedo vigalet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:830: tasmāt yoginaḥ paracittavedanāvasare iyān prakāśaḥ ---- etaddehaprakāśasahacārī ghaṭasukhādiprakāśaḥ ---- iti / tatra ghaṭasukhādi idantayā bhāti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:831_1: tu tanniṣṭhām idantām eva prakāśabhāge 'pi manyamāna idaṃ parajñānam iti abhimanyate
GSP30abhiprvu:831_2: avigalitasvaparavibhāgo yogī / prāptaprakarṣastu sarvam ātmatvena paśyan svasṛṣṭameva
GSP30abhiprvu:831_3: svaparavibhāgaṃ manyate iti jñānasya na yogijñānena prakāśyatā / bhavatu vā tathāpi
GSP30abhiprvu:831_4: prakṛtaṃ na etatsamam / tathā hi ---- ayamanubhavati iti paraniṣṭha eva asau anubhave yoginaḥ prakāśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:832: na tu ahamanubhavāmi iti ātmāroheṇa vartamānaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:833: iha tu anvabhūvam iti ahamaṃśaviśrāntiḥ anālīḍhedaṃbhāvaiva anubhavasya iti yuktamuktam ---- yasmāt anubhavaḥ pṛthak na bhāti tasmāt aikyaṃ bhinnakālānāṃ saṃvidāṃ veditā iti //5//
GSP30abhiprvu:834: yadyahaṃabhāvaviśrāntivaśāt anubhavaḥ smṛtau pṛthak na bhāti iti ucyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:835: tadā parāmarśāntaraṃ sākṣādeva idantayā anubhavaṃ parāmṛśat yadi vā idaṃbhāvocitaghaṭādiviśrāntatām anubhavasya prathayat upalabdham ,
GSP30abhiprvu:836: iti tadanusāreṇāpi kiṃ na vyavahriyate iti parābhiprāyaṃ pratikṣipati
GSP30abhiprvu:841: sa hi na pṛthagbhūtāṃ dṛśaṃ kāṃcit manyate ---- sā dṛk me āsīt ityevam / evamapi tu yat smaryate evaṃbhūtamapi yat smaraṇaṃ kasyacit vivecakaṃmanyasya ,
GSP30abhiprvu:843: padasyeva prakṛtipratyayārthanirūpaṃaṃ kālpanikaṃ vibhajya ākaraṇaṃ paratra pratipādanamātram / so 'pi yadi mūlapratīti vedayate pūrvoktakrameṇa ,
GSP30abhiprvu:845_0: yata eva tat rāhoḥ śiraḥ itivat kalpitaṃ bhedaṃ manyate / anyathā sa ghaṭaḥ itivat

GSP30abhiprvu:914_1: svadarśane 'rthatattvam upadarśayan bāhyārthasadbhāve pratyakṣaṃ parākaroti pramāṇatvena /
GSP30abhiprvu:914_2: tato dvayena anumeyatāmapi bāhyasya nirasyati / anantaraṃ ślokena cidātmani arthānām

GSP30abhiprvu:1004_1: abhāvāt prabodho'vicitra iti eka eva prabodhaḥ iti samameva nīlādivaicitryaṃ bhāseta /
GSP30abhiprvu:1004_2: atha svasaṃtānavartīni jñānāntarāṇi vicitrāṇi prabodhakāraṇāni iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1009: anumātrabhimatasaṃbinmātrarūpābhede paratvaṃ kasya bhavet iti na vidmaḥ / bodhasya tanniṣṭhasya iti cet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1010: so 'pi pramāṇena yadi na siddhaḥ tat asat eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1011: siddho 'pi prameyatayā cet tat jaḍa eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1012_0: tathāpi ca kāyādivat eva jñānamātrasvabhāvaḥ svasaṃvinmātrarūpatve paraṃ prati asya
GSP30abhiprvu:1012_1: asiddheḥ / nanu vyāhārādikriyā svātmani icchayā vyāhareyam ityevaṃrūpayā hetubhāvena
GSP30abhiprvu:1012_2: vyāptā dṛṣṭā tat caitrakāye'pi tayā taddhetukayā bhāvyam / na ca matsaṃtatipatitā
GSP30abhiprvu:1014_0: tadeva saṃtānāntaram iti / atrocyate ---- iha anumātuḥ vyāhārābhāso dvidhā bhavati
GSP30abhiprvu:1014_2: ca vyāharati ayam iti vicchedajīvita iti anyasya vyāptiḥ gṛhītā anyaśca ābhāsaḥ katham idānīṃ hetuḥ syāt ?
GSP30abhiprvu:1015: vyāharati iti ābhāsasya hetuḥ avidita eva iti kathaṃ tato hetoḥ samīhā anumīyeta ?
GSP30abhiprvu:1016: kiṃ ca vyāharati ayam iti yaḥ pramātrantare 'numātṛsaṃmate vicchinnatayā avabhāsaḥ so'numeyasaṃmatāyāḥ paramīhāyāḥ kathaṃ kāryaḥ syāt ?
GSP30abhiprvu:1017: tasyā hi vyāharāmītyābhāsaḥ kāryo yo'sau avicchedajīvitaḥ / na ca avicchedamayasya vicchedamayaḥ kāryam iti yuktaṃ tathābhūtakāryakāraṇabhāvagrahaṇopāyābhāvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1018: na hi svātmani yo'yam avicchinnābhāsaḥ sa paratra vicchinnaṃ vyāharati ityevaṃrūpam ābhāsaṃ janayati iti kenacit pramāṇena siddham ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1020_0: parapramātṛsiddhaśca evaṃbhūtārthādhīnatvena itaretarāśrayāt / na ca avaśyan avicchinnāt
GSP30abhiprvu:1020_1: vicchinnena bhāvyam iti niyamo 'sti vyavhicārāt / na ca vicchinno 'pi ābhāsa upadyatām
GSP30abhiprvu:1020_2: iti tadanusaṃdhānāt tadutpattiḥ niyatā tatsadbhāve 'pyasyānutpatteḥ tadabhāve ca utpatteḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1021: vicchinna ābhāsaḥ paratra utpadyatām iti yā samīhā tayā saha pratra utpannasya vicchinnābhāsasya kāryakāraṇabhāvagrahaṇameva parāsiddhau na yukta,
GSP30abhiprvu:1023_0: pramātrantarāṇi ca yadi bhinnāni tadā tanniṣṭhānām avabhāsānāṃ bheda eva jñānādavyatiriktaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:1023_1: ca iti nyāyāt / tataśca ekābhāsaniṣṭhatvābhāvāt ekābhāsaviśrāntaḥ saṃbhūya pramātḥṇāṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:1023_2: vyavahāro na syāt iti anyosaṃbhavaḥ ---- yat prameyaṃ bodhāt bhinnaṃ bhavati iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1023_3: sahopalambhaniyamādeḥ anaikāntikatvāt nīlapītādināpi prameyarāśinā kim apakṛtam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1026_0: siddhau vā sarvapramātrantargatā ābhāsā ekaikatra paratra ābhāsavaicitryahetuṃ vāsanodvodhavaicitryaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:1026_1: janayeyuḥ niyame hetvantarābhāvāt iti tathāpi na nīlādivaicitryasiddhiḥ / evaṃ vāsanānāṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:1026_2: tadudbodhahetūnāṃ ca vicitrāṇām anupapattireva / tataśca sthitametat ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1027_0: abhinno bodhaḥ tasya ākasmikābhāsabhedahetutvānupapatteḥ bāhyo'rtho'numeyaḥ saṃbhāvyate
GSP30abhiprvu:1027_1: iti yadi bāhyārthavādinā ucyate iti ślokadvayārthaḥ / cecchabdaḥ ślokadvayavākyārthaśaṅkādyotakaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1028: adhunā tu enāṃ saṃbhāvanāṃ śithilayituṃ tāvadāha
GSP30abhiprvu:1032_0: syādetat iti pūrvoktasaṃbhāvanābhyupagame yadā vyākhyāyate tadā kiṃ tu iti vākyaśeṣeṇa
GSP30abhiprvu:1032_1: tacchaithilyaviṣayaṃ saṃbhāvanāntaraṃ śeṣaślokena darśayate iti vyākhyeyam / yadi
GSP30abhiprvu:1032_2: tu adhyāhāro na sahyate tadā syādetaditi idamapi saṃbhāvanāntaraṃ syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1033: yadanena ślokena ucyate iti ekavākyatayā yojyam / anayāpi kaṣṭakalpanayā bāhyān arthān prasādhayatā bhavatā taiḥ na kiṃcit kartavyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1035: na hi nityānumeyena kaścit vyavahāra iti kiṃ bāhyena ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1037: bādhakaṃ ca prakāśāt bhede anumeyatayāpi prakāśanābhāva iti tāvat mukhyam / abhyuścayabādhakastu avayavino vṛttyanupapattiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1040: aṇusaṃcayabāhyavāde 'pi saṃcayasya anyasya abhāve paramāṇava eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1041: te ca yadi saṃyujyante nirantaratayā tat avaśyaṃ digbhāgabhedaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1042_0: evanākṣe ṣaṭsu dikṣu saṃcīyamāneṣu ṣaṭsu aṇuṣu madhyamasya paramāṇoḥ yatraiva dhāmni
GSP30abhiprvu:1042_1: eko lagnaḥ tatraiva yadi aparaḥ tat ekaparamāṇumātratā / atha anyatra ekaḥ anyatar
GSP30abhiprvu:1044: tasyāpi eṣaiva saraṇiḥ iti na kiṃcit avaśiṣyate bāhyaṃ tattvataḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1046: saṃyoge bhinnadeśatvāvyāvṛtteḥ tanniṣṭaṃ dvyaṇukaṃ nāma kāryadravyam aṇuparimāṇam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1047: tebhyaḥ tribhyo mahatkāryam iti / avayavīvādo hi ayam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1048_0: sa ca pūrvameva apabādhitaḥ / yacca avyāpyavṛttitvaṃ saṃyogasya ucyate tanniraṃśe
GSP30abhiprvu:1048_1: kathaṃ saṃgacchatām / svāśraye hi yadi asau samavaiti kim anyāt asya avaśiṣyate yat
GSP30abhiprvu:1048_2: na vyāpnuyāt iti / abhyuścayabādhakaṃ ca idam iti na atra asmābhiḥ bharaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1049: nanu bādhakaṃ nāma pramāṇasiddhe vastuni na kiṃcit kartuṃ samartham ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1050: tenaiva dṛḍhena pramāṇena bādhakābhimatasya bādhitasya apramāṇatvasaṃpādanāt / darśitaṃ ca iha sādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ kāryahetuḥ tattadākasmikābhāsa iti kārikayā ityāśaṅkya āha
GSP30abhiprvu:1054: iha tāvat svapna -- smaraṇa -- manorājya -- saṃkalpādiṣu nīlādyābhāsavaicitryaṃ bāhyasamarpakahtuvyatirekeṇaiva nirbhāsate iti yadyapi asti saṃbhavaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1055_1: avastu iti śaṅkyeta / yat punaridaṃ yoginām icchāmātreṇa purasenādivaicitryanirmāṇaṃ dṛṣṭam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1056: tatra upādānaṃ prasiddhamṛtkāṣṭha-śukra -- śoṇi -- tādivaicitryamayaṃ na saṃbhavatyeva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1057_0: na hi evaṃ vaktuṃ śakyam ---- sarvagatāḥ paramāṇavo yogīcchayā jhaṭiti saṃghaṭitāḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1057_1: kāryam ārapsyante iti / yat etat lokaprasiddhakāraṇabhāvānatikramasiddhaye nirūpyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1057_2: na ca etat prasiddham ---- pramāṇubhya eva sthūlaṃ ghaṭādi jāyate iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1059: tathāpi niyatasahakārisamavalambanam karacaraṇādivyāpāre viśiṣṭadeśakāladharmādhipatyayogaḥ śikṣābhyāsaprakarṣa iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1060: iyati ca āṃśrīyamāṇe yogī kumbhaṃ nirmimāṇaḥ kumbhakāraprasiddhasanastasāmagrīsanarjanapuraḥsaraṃghaṭaṃ ghaṭayan kumbhakāra eva syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1061_1: iti / tatra yogisaṃvida eva sā tādṛśī śaktiḥ ---- yat ābhāsavaicitryarūpam arthajātaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:1061_2: prakāśayati iti / tadasti saṃbhavaḥ ---- yat saṃvit eva abhyupagatasvātantryā apratīdhātalakṣaṇāt
GSP30abhiprvu:1061_3: icchāviśeṣavaśāt saṃvido 'nidhikātmatāyā anapāyāt antaḥsthitameva sat bhāvajātam
GSP30abhiprvu:1061_4: idamityevaṃ prāṇabuddhidehādeḥ vitīrṇakiyanmātrasaṃvidūpāt svātantryaṃ kiṃ na abhyupagamyate
GSP30abhiprvu:1062_0: kimiti hetvantaraparyeṣaṇāprayāsena khidyate / evakāreṇa idamāha ---- sarveṇa tāvat
GSP30abhiprvu:1062_1: vādinā viṣayavyavasthāpanaṃ saṃvidrūpam anapahnavanīyam ādisiddhaṃ hi tat iti uktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1062_2: tasya ca svātantryameva devaśabdanirdiṣṭaṃ cidrūpatvam iti kim aparakāraṇānveṣaṇavyasanitayā /
GSP30abhiprvu:1062_3: hi yasmāt evaṃ prakāśayati deva iti saṃbhāvyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1063: tasmāt kiṃ bāhyena anupapattinā iti pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ //7//
GSP30abhiprvu:1065: tatra kiṃ makurapratibimbitaghaṭādidṛṣṭāntena jñānapratibimbatābhāsavaicitrye vijñānadarpaṇātiriktaṃ tata eva bāhyābhimataṃ hetuṃ kalpayema ?
GSP30abhiprvu:1066: kiṃ vā yogidṛṣṭāntena saṃvitsvātantryameva hetubhāvena brūyāma ?
GSP30abhiprvu:1067: tadidaṃ sāṃśayikaṃ vartate iti āśaṅkya bāhyārthānumānasaṃbhāvanāṃ sūtradvayena apākartumāha
GSP30abhiprvu:1073: na kevalam anantaraślokanirdiṣṭābhiḥ yuktabhiḥ pratyakṣeṇa bāhyo'rtho na bhāsate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1074: iyadeva hi pratyakṣaṃ tacca nīlaṃ bhāti iti svaprakāśasaṃvidrūpaṃ nādhikaṃ kiṃcit iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1075_0: yāvat anumānenāpi na asya bāhyāsya siddhiḥ iti apiśabdasyābhiprāyaḥ / tatra anumānam
GSP30abhiprvu:1075_1: atra naiva pravartitum utsahate / pravṛttamapi na prakṛtasiddhim ādavyāt iti anena
GSP30abhiprvu:1076_0: sarvaśca ayaṃ vikalpo'nubhavamūla iti prasiddham / tena yat sarvathā anābhātapūrvam
GSP30abhiprvu:1076_1: ananubhūtacaraṃ tatra anumānam anumitivyāpāro vikalpātmā naiva kenacit vādinā iṣyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1076_2: nanu bhavatu pratyakṣato dṛṣṭe 'numāne saṃkathā iyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1077: sāmānyato dṛṣṭe tu kiṃ vakṣyasi yathā arthopalabdhyā indriyānumāne ?
GSP30abhiprvu:1078: ucyate ---- tatrāpi vikalpena yathā so'rthaḥ spṛśyate tathā anumeya iti sthitiḥ / vikalpaśca na indriyādikam arthaṃ kenacit saṃniveśaviśeṣādinā viśeṣātmanā spṛśati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1079: api tu kiṃcidupalabdheḥ kāraṇam iti amunā svabhāvena ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1080_0: sa ca svabhāvaḥ kāraṇatālakṣaṇaḥ pratyakṣagṛhīta eva / tathā ca bījāt aṅkuraḥ tantubhyaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1080_1: paṭa ityādau kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ pratyakṣānupalambhabalena tāvat niśceyaḥ / tatra ca
GSP30abhiprvu:1081: vimarśalakṣaṇasya pramitivyāpārasya ekaikaśabdavācye'rthe pravṛtteḥ tadanusāritvācca pramāṇasya iti vakṣyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1083_0: iti / ābhāsamātraṃ ca sāmānyam iti nir.eṣuate / anupalambho'pi anyopalambharūpa ābhāsamātraviśrānta
GSP30abhiprvu:1083_1: eva iti kāraṇābhāso viśeṣaśūnyaḥ parigṛhīta eva bījāt aṅkura iti pratītau / yat yasya
GSP30abhiprvu:1083_2: niyamam anuvidhatte avyatiriktam tat tasya kāryam iti pratighaṭaṃ mṛttikādirūpahetutadvanmātrasya āmāsāt //8 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1085_0: sa ca ābhāsate iti vipratiṣiddham / anābhāse ca nāsti vikalparūpasya anumānasya vyāpāraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1085_1: grāmagṛhādestu yat bāhyaṃ tat agrāmādirūpaṃ na ucyate pratyekaṃ vāṭānūpakuṇyatulādeḥ bāhyatvaprasaṅgāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1087_0: tasmāt grāmabāhyam ābhāsabāhyam iti ca śabdasāmyamātram etat na vastusāmyam / evaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:1087_1: ye vikalpe vastu na ābhāti iti manyante teṣāmapi tāvat anumānavikalpo na bāhye upapannaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1087_2: asmābhistu upapāditam ---- adhyavasāyasyāpi ābhāsamānaviṣayatvam bhrāntitve cāvasāyasya
GSP30abhiprvu:1087_3: iti sūtre / tena anumānavikalpātmanāpi prakāśena yadi anāviṣṭo nīlādiḥ arthaḥ tat
GSP30abhiprvu:1087_4: na anumita eva syāt / atha āviṣṭa eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1088: tarhi prāgivārtho 'prakāśaḥ syāt iti nyāyena prakāśamātrasvabhāva eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1089: na bāhyaḥ / tena bāhye sādhye yat kiṃcit pramāṇam ānīyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1092: kenāpi prakāreṇa pratyakṣātmanā anumeyātmanā vā ābhāsanam ābhāso bāhyasya anābhāsasya na kadācit abhūt iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1093: tasmāt siddham cidātmaiva hi deva iti //9//
GSP30abhiprvu:1094: nanu antaḥsthitaṃ bahiḥ prakāśayedityuktaṃ tat antaḥsthitatvam upapādanīyam iti āśaṅkya āha
GSP30abhiprvu:1097: astyeva na vinā tasmādicchāmarśaḥ pravartate // Ipk_1,5.10 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1104: kiṃ tu tatra aham iti ucite parāmarśe yo 'yam idantāparāmarśaḥ saiva bāhyatā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1105: tacca iha antaḥsthitatvam ahamityetāvatā citsamucitenaiva bapuṣā parāmarśanameva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1108: yadi hi na syāt kumbhakṛto ghaṭaṃ karavāṇi iti ya uttarakriyāmapekṣya icchāśabdavācyaḥ parāmarśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1109: eṣaṇīyena sa parāmṛśyena aniyantritaḥ cet tataḥ paṭecchāpi sā na kasmāt iti saṃkīryeran vyavahārāḥ / atha tatrāpi ca eṣaṇīyaḥ tadānīmeva nirmitaḥ san tathā jātaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1110_0: tarhi tannirmāṇaṃ cidātmani vinecchayā nopapannam iti tiṣṭhāsorevamicchaiva hetutā
GSP30abhiprvu:1110_1: ityatra varṇayiṣyate / tacca icchāntaramapi viṣayaniyantritaṃ na vā iti vikalpe 'navasthā /
GSP30abhiprvu:1111_0: na cet ghaṭe paṭecchā syāt / atha tatrāpi tadānīmeva iti kṛtvā anavasthā / tasmāt
GSP30abhiprvu:1111_1: sarvo 'yaṃ bhāvarāśiḥ cidātmani aham ityeva vapuṣā satatāvabhāsuravapuḥ aiśvaryarūpācca
GSP30abhiprvu:1111_2: svātantryalakṣaṇāt svāmibhāvāt vicitreṇa vapuṣā kramākramādinā saṃvit enaṃ bahiḥkaroti
GSP30abhiprvu:1112_0: tatrāpi kvacit ābhāse pramātḥn ekīkaroti nitambanīnṛtta iva prekṣakān / tāvati hi
GSP30abhiprvu:1112_1: teṣām ābhāse aikyam / śarīraprāṇabuddhisukhādyābhāsāṃśeṣu tu bhedasya avigalanāt
GSP30abhiprvu:1112_2: na sarvathā aikyam / ata eva pratikṣaṇaṃ pramātṛsaṃyojanaviyojanavaicitryeṇa parameśvaro
GSP30abhiprvu:1119: iti / tasmāt sthitam antaḥsthitaṃ bhāvajātaṃ tena vinā tadviṣayasya parāmarśāyogāt iti //10//
GSP30abhiprvu:1120: nanu parāmarśo nāma vikalpaḥ , sa ca avikalpaśuddhasaṃvidvapuṣi bhagavati kathaṃ syāt ityāśaṅkyāha
GSP30abhiprvu:1125: anavabhāsasya ca aprakāśasya ghaṭādeḥ parasparaparihāreṇa dvayoḥ svātmani cet vyavasthānam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1126: tat ghaṭapaṭayoḥ iva idamjaḍam idaṃ jaḍam iti durupapādaṃ vailakṣaṇyam / atha avabhāso yato 'rthasya saṃbamdhī ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1128: tarhi saṃbandhamātreṇa mṛt api ghaṭasya iti ajaḍā syāt / atha na svasaṃbandhamātram api tu avabhāso 'rthasya prakāśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1129: tarhi arthātmanā sa prakāśa iti samāpatitam / na ca anyātmanā anyasya prakāśa upapannaḥ / atha anyasvabhāvo 'pi ghaṭo'vabhāsasya kāraṇam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1130: tarhi avabhāso'pi ghaṭasya kāraṇam iti ghaṭo'pi ajaḍaḥ syāt / atha anyena satāpi ghaṭena yato 'vabhāsasya pratibimbarūpā cchāyā dattā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1131: tām asau adabhāso bibhrat ghaṭasya iti ucyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1133: tarhi sphaṭikasalilamakurādiḥ api evaṃbhūta eva iti ajaḍa eva syāt / atha tathābhūtamapi ātmānaṃ taṃ ca ghaṭādikaṃ sphaṭikādiḥ na parāmraṣṭuṃ samartha iti jad.aḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1134_1: svātmaviśrāntilakṣaṇam ananyamukhaprekṣitvaṃ nāma / ahamevaṃ prakāśātmā prakāśe iti
GSP30abhiprvu:1134_2: hi vimarśodaye svasaṃvideva pramātṛprameyapramāṇādi kṛtārtham abhimanyate na tu atiriktaṃ kāṅkṣati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1135_0: sphaṭikādi hi gṛhītapratibimbamapi tathābhāvena siddhau pramātrantaram apekṣate iti
GSP30abhiprvu:1139: iti / madhyāvasthaiva tu idantā vimṛśyamānaūrvāparakoṭiḥ vimūḍhānāṃ māyāpadaṃ saṃsāraḥ iti vimarśa eva pradhānaṃ bhagavata iti sthitam //11//
GSP30abhiprvu:1140: na kevalaṃ saṃvittattvasya asmābhiḥ eva vimarśaprādhānyam uktam yāvat āgamāntarairapi iti darśayati
GSP30abhiprvu:1144: yato vimarśa eva pradhānam ātmano rūpam amumeva hetuṃ prayojanarūpam uddiśya ātmā dharmisvabhāvo dravyabhūto 'pi ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1145: caitantyam iti dharmavācinā śabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyam āśritya uditaḥ kathitaḥ ,

GSP30abhiprvu:2789: nanuparidṛṣṭabījādivyatiriktabuddhimatkāraṇakalpanena vinā kimuparudhyata iti parasya bhrāntiṃ bhindannāha
GSP30abhiprvu:2792: tathā hi iti nidarśanopakrameṇa vyāptirevaṃbhūtaiva dṛṣṭā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2793: ---- iti draḍhayati / jaḍā hetavaścetanapreritāḥ kāryaṃ kurvanti ,

GSP30abhiprvu:2795_0: sā ca kumbhakārāyattā iti cet siddhaṃ naḥ sādhyam ---- śivikasaṃpādane 'pi te cetanapreraṇāmapekṣante
GSP30abhiprvu:2795_1: iti / tajjaḍakāraṇānāṃ cetanapreraṇāmantareṇa na kvacit kāryakāritvam / yadi hi syāt mṛdādīnāmapi syāt ,

GSP30abhiprvu:2809_0: ---- niyoge liṅ / kiṃ ca yadi na krudhyate vastutaḥ kumbhakāro'pi aiśvaryaiva svatantraviśvātmatārūpayā
GSP30abhiprvu:2811: tantavo 'pi vā paṭasaṃpādanecchāṃ kiṃ nādriyetan / tadetadapi uktam anenaiva sūtreṇa tathā hi iti / nanvevaṃ kumbhakṛto nāsti kartṛtvam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2812_0: ---- iti samutsīdet dharmādharmavyavasthā / yadi pratyeṣi yuktyāgamayoḥ tadevameva /
GSP30abhiprvu:2812_1: tathāpi samastetaranirmāṇamadhya eva idamapi parameśvareṇaiva nirmitaṃ yadavicalastasya
GSP30abhiprvu:2812_2: kumbhakārapaśormithyākartṛtvābhimānaḥ pratibhuva iva adhamarṇatābhimānaḥ / yadi punarīśvarasyecchaiva
GSP30abhiprvu:2812_3: iyamīdṛśī mā asya abhimāno'yam udgamat iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2813: tadā nāsau kartā kaścit / tadidamapi uktaṃ sūterṇaiva tathā hi iti / kumbhakārasyāpi mṛdādisaṃskāra krameṇa kiṃ ghaṭaṃ janayāmi ,

GSP30abhiprvu:2817: ahaṃ ca sa eva iti na parimite kartā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2819: ---- iti etāvati sarvathā hṛdayena avadhātavyam iti sthitam //9//
GSP30abhiprvu:2820: dṛśyate 'sya cetanasya svātantryameva sarvatra jambhamāṇaṃ jaḍānapi yat svātmatāmāpādayati ,

GSP30abhiprvu:2829: akāraṇakatvaprasaṅgāt teṣāṃ vā akāraṇatvaprasaṃgāt / athocyate ---- anye eva te ghaṭāṅkurādayo mṛddhījādijanyāḥ ,

GSP30abhiprvu:2841_1: eva tu tathā tathā bhavati / bhagavān bhūribhargo mahādevo niyatyanuvartanollaṅghanatarasvātantryaḥ ,

GSP30abhiprvu:2844_1: prakāśate / cetano hi svātmadarpaṇe bhāvān pratibimbavadābhāsayati iti siddhāntaḥ / yadāha pūrvaguruḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:2848: nanu yadi prasiddhakāraṇollaṅghanenāpi tatkāryaviśeṣatulyavṛttānyeva kāryāṇi jāyante ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2849_0: bhagnāstarhi anumānakathāḥ / tathā hi mathamanyadanyatra niyamavadbhavet ityāśaṅkya
GSP30abhiprvu:2849_1: prāmāṇikatarammanyaistādātmyatadutpattī niyamanidānamupagate / na hi niḥsvabhāvaṃ vastu bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2850_0: nāpi bhinnasvabhāvaṃ svabhāvabhedena bhedāt / paryāyaśastatsvabhāvadvayābhāve ca
GSP30abhiprvu:2850_1: niḥsvabhāvatāprasaṅgāt / evaṃ nirhetuke bhinnahetuke ca kārye vācyam / ubhayatrāpi
GSP30abhiprvu:2850_2: ca hetukṛtaiva vyavasthā / svahetuta eva hi śiṃśapā vṛkṣasvabhāvāvyabhicāriṇī jātā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2852: tadidānīṃ niyatyullaṅghini kāryakāraṇabhāve sarvamidaṃ vighaṭeta / yogīcchayā hi śiṃśapāpi avṛkṣasvabhāvā bhavet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2853: dhūme tu dviguṇaṃ codyam ; agnyādisāmagrī yogīcchodbhūtā dhūmaṃ na janayet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2858: kāryaṃ hetuḥ svabhāvo vāta evotpattimūlajaḥ // Ipk_2,4.11 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2859: yogīcchāpi sarvathā tādṛśameva na tu vṛścikagomayādisaṃbhūtavṛścikādinyāyena kathaṃcit rasavīryādinā bhinnaṃ kāryaṃ janayati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2860: ---- iti yat kathitamata evāsymādeva hetoḥ kāryaṃ vā dhūmādi agnyādyanumāne ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2861: śiṃśapātvādisvabhāvo vā vṛkṣatvādyanumāne evaṃ heturbhavati / yadi pramāṇāntareṇa evānumāne janmāntarābhyāsalokaprasiddhyādikamavaśyopajīvyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2863_0: ---- iti ca ṛtaṃbharāviṣayamuvāca patañjaliḥ / anye ca yauktikā yogipratyakṣakalpapratyakṣasadbhāvaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:2863_1: samastavastugrahaṇāya kalpitavantaḥ / sāṃvyavahārike ca pramāṇe nāsmākaṃ bharaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2866: prameyoparodhe 'pi noparudhyata ityuktamasakṛt / nanu svabhāvahetau kimanyā cintayā ?
GSP30abhiprvu:2868: āha ---- vṛkṣatvāvyabhicāriṇyāḥ śiṃśapāyā utpatteryanmūlaṃ kāraṇaṃ tata eva sa sanmātrānubandhī svabhāvo jāyate , ---- iti ; tataśca
GSP30abhiprvu:2871: iti svabhāvaheturnyāyaḥ / nanu ca vṛścikādīnāṃ kīṭagomayādyanekakāraṇakatvaṃ tāvat dṛṣṭaṃ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2874: svabhāvasya tu kathaṃ viparyāsasaṃbhāvanā / na hi nīlaṃ sadevānīlaṃ yogīcchayā bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2875: ---- iti kaścit prāmāṇikaḥ pratīyāt / ucyate / iha dvividho hi svabhāvaheturantarlīnakāryakāraṇabhāvastadviparītaśca ;
GSP30abhiprvu:2877: anityo 'yaṃ kṛtakatvāt iti / tatra ādyasya tāvat kāryakāraṇabhāva eṣa mūlam ---- iti kiṃ tatrocyate / aparastu vicāryate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2878_0: yadi tāvat kṛtakatvasya kāraṇāyattatvaṃ nāma svabhāvaḥ katham abhavanaparicchinnabhavanasvabhāvatā
GSP30abhiprvu:2878_1: nāmānityatvaṃ svabhāvaḥ syāt ābhāsabhedāt / abhede tu ābhāsasya hetusiddhāveva sādhyasya siddhatvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2883: tatra ca niyatiśaktiraṅgīkrṭā bhavatāpi / tasmāt sarveṣu svabhāvahetuṣvābhāsabhedaṃ vinā vyavahāramātrasādhanameva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2886: sāmānyānāmiyameva saraṇiḥ / tasmāt niyataḥ śiṃśapābhāsavṛkṣābhāsayoḥ pūrvanītyā sāmānādhikaraṇyābhāso hetubalāt ! tataḥ svabhāvo'yaṃ hetuhetumadbhāvamūla eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2887: tata eva sāmānyenedamuktaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ ---- sarvaḥ svabhāvaheturutpattimūlajaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2889: ---- iti ca samarthitaṃ prāk / tataśca śiṃśapāyāmekasyāmeva sṛjyamānāyāṃ śākhādimadarthāntarāṇāmasṛṣṭervṛkṣābhāsasya sāmānyātmanaḥ sādhyasya nāmāpi nāsti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2890: ---- iti saṃbhāvyata eva / yattu tadekarūpaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ vṛkṣatvaṃ tat khalu śiṃśapātvameva tacca siddham ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2892: ---- ityābhāse 'pi na syādanityatābhāsaḥ / evamarthakriyākāritvābhāve 'pi kṣaṇikatvābhāsābhāvaḥ iti niyatyapekṣayaiva sarve svabhāvahetavo nānyathā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2900: ekavāraṃ tāvat mahānase pratyakṣānupalambhabalenāgnyābhāsadhūmābhāsayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo gṛhītaḥ / tatra vijñānavādino darśane pratisantānamanyaścānyaścābhāsaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2901_0: ---- iti svābhāsayoreva kāryakāraṇatā gṛhītā na tu santānāntaragatayostadīyavṛttāntasyāsaṃvedanāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:2901_2: iti niścayaḥ / iha tu darśane vyāptigrahaṇāvasthāyāṃ yāvantastaddeśasaṃbhāvyamānasadbhāvāḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:2903: ---- iti hi uktam / tataḥ svaparasantānaviśeṣatyāgena dhūmābhāsamātraṃ vahnyābhāsamātrasya kāryam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2904_0: ---- iti vyāptau gṛhītāyāṃ bhūyo'pi parvate yo dhūmābhāsaḥ so 'pi agnyābhāsādeva
GSP30abhiprvu:2904_1: iti vyāptiṃ smṛtvānuimimīte atra parvate agnyābhāsaḥ iti / tāvati dhūmābhāsaviśeṣe
GSP30abhiprvu:2905: iti yāvat / bhūya iti vyāptiṃ gṛhītvā punarapi yo dhūmābhāsaḥ ,

GSP30abhiprvu:2913: paro nūtanādanyo yo dhūmābhāsaḥ sa dhūmābhāsādeva pramātrantaravartino'dhipatirūpāt parokṣāt ,

GSP30abhiprvu:2924: bhāvadvayamapi ca na yugapadbhāvi kāryakāra.anarūpaṃ ghaṭapaṭavat ,

GSP30abhiprvu:2948_1: samanvayo nānyaḥ śuṣkaḥ kaścit / sa ca yadi svatantre cidrūpe bhāvadvayaṃ viśrāmyati tadopapadyate ,

GSP30abhiprvu:2969: ---- iti vitatagrāhiṇī pratītiḥ / bhāgābhiniveśavaśāt tu kāraṇakāryatāparikalpanaṃ tasyaiva bhāvasya viśasanaprāyam , ---- ityāśaṅkyāha
GSP30abhiprvu:2971: tathā syāt kartṛtaivaivaṃ tathāpariṇamat tayā // Ipk_2,4.18 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2972: iha dīrghadarśinā pratyakṣānumānāgamānyatamapramāṇamūlāṃ pratyabhijñāmāśritya tadevedaṃ sukhaduḥkhamohasāmyamanantaprakāravaiṣamyāvalambanena viśvībhūtam ,

GSP30abhiprvu:3673: ityādi / tāṃ vibhāvya yadyaniśamāviśati śarīraprāṇabuddhiśūnyebhyo'nyatamaṃ dvayaṃ sarvaṃ vā tatraiva nimajjayati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3674: anavarataṃ tattāṃ tāṃ vibhūtiṃ mahāvibhūtiparyantāṃ labhate //16//
GSP30abhiprvu:3675: nanu yadyātmākhyaṃ vastu tadeva tarhi tasya pratyabhijñānāpratyabhijñānayoraviśeṣaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3680: pramātṛviśrānticamatkārasārā ca prītyādirūpā / tatrādyā satyaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ nāpekṣate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3681: dvitīyā tu tadapekṣate eva / iha ca ahaṃ maheśvaraḥ ityevaṃbhūtacamatkārasārā parāparasiddhilakṣaṇā jīvanmuktivibhūtiyogamayyarthakriyā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3682: itīśvarapratyabhijñānamatrāvaśyāpekṣaṇīyam / nanu pramātṛviśrāntisārārthakriyā pratyabhijñānena vinā na dṛṣṭā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3686: kānto lokasamāna evamaparijñāto na rantuṃ yathā /
GSP30abhiprvu:3690_0: tadā tadupayācitavaśāt aśaṅkitameva savidhavartini priyatame'valokite taistairutkarṣaviśeṣaiḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:3691: tathā svātmani viśveśvare satataṃ nirbhāsamāne'pi tannirbhāsanaṃ na hṛḍayasya pūrṇatāmādhatte ;
GSP30abhiprvu:3692_1: na parāmṛṣṭaḥ ---- iti bhāsamānaghaṭāditulyavṛttānto jātaḥ / yadā tu dūtīvacanādvā
GSP30abhiprvu:3697: samāveśābhyāsarase tu vibhūtilābhaḥ ---- iti tasya pratyabhijñaiva parāparasiddhipradāyinī bhavati //17//
